    • Method Detail

      • playMusic

        public void playMusic(java.lang.String filePath)
        Loads an audiofile and immediatly starts playing. If another audiofile is already beeing played, it is stopped and the new one will start.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The filesystem path to the music file

      • stopMusic
